member.name: M:Exercise_Project.DatabaseHelper.ExecuteNonQuery(System.String@,System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter[]@)
member.summary: This sub will execute an sql command. It will not return anything. It also accepts an array of parameters to pass to the sql command

member.name: M:Exercise_Project.DatabaseHelper.ExecuteScalar(System.String@,System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter[]@)
member.summary: This function executes a scalar method. It returns an object type which will need to be casted on the client side

member.name: M:Exercise_Project.DatabaseHelper.ExecuteReader(System.String@,System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter[]@)
member.summary: This function returns an sqldatareader. It closes the connection as soon as the reader is disposed

member.name: P:Exercise_Project.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager

member.name: P:Exercise_Project.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:Exercise_Project.My.Resources.Resources
